name: Legends of Atlantis: Exodus
description: Save Atlantis by building roads, clearing debris, and gathering resources in this strategic time management game!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7, or 8 Processor: 1.2 GHz Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: 128 MB video card DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 457 MB available space

reviews.review_text: If you enjoy time management games then this would be a good one to pick up. The artwork is drawn really well and the animations are too. The music is calming since you're going to use your organizational skills to advance through it. I didn't have a problem at all running it on a Win 7 64bit single core laptop. So the requirements are pretty basic. Some secret mini-games are included which I've never seen in time mgmt. before which adds a fresh and innovative addition. Even if you can't find this on sale? It sure seems to be well worth the full retail with the 3 hours I've already invested. And most importantly? There are no negative reviews as my updated review. It tells you something for sure.
